code: var trim=function trim(string){return string.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'');},isArray=function isArray(arg){return Object.prototype.toString.call(arg)==='[object Array]';};module.exports=function(headers){if(!headers)return{};var result={};var headersArr=trim(headers).split('\n');for(var i=0;i<headersArr.length;i++){var row=headersArr[i];var index=row.indexOf(':'),key=trim(row.slice(0,index)).toLowerCase(),value=trim(row.slice(index+1));if(typeof result[key]==='undefined'){result[key]=value;}else if(isArray(result[key])){result[key].push(value);}else{result[key]=[result[key],value];}}return result;};
